scripts.build: npm run setup && rimraf dist && NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=false webpack --mode=development && eleventy
scripts.watch: npm run setup && rimraf dist && NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=true webpack --mode=production & eleventy --watch
scripts.setup: cd templates/_includes && ln -sfn ../../../../config/eleventy-config/sitewide_includes site && cd ../.. && cd templates/img && mkdir -p site && cp -r ../../../../config/eleventy-config/sitewide_images/* site && cd ../..
